attributes.action: ALL fuel and energy supplies ie.petrol,diesel,gas,elecric ,nation alised ,no private share holders.
attributes.additional_details: All fuel and energy supplies, ie. petrol, diesel,gas, elecricity,nationlised to ensure full control of all prices wholsale and retail are cotrolled at one source to ensure everyone is in the same boat.Then the Government can ensure we are all working together.
